nodes.text: Force euphoria was a state in which an individual could enter after drawing on the Force so heavily that his or her cells were overloaded with energy. A symptom of Force euphoria was a rapid and excited voice. When the user's body became unable to keep him or her from collasping any longer, the euphoria itself was followed by a crash every bit as severe as that of a spice-addict coming down from an overdose. When Jaina Solo kept drawing on the Force to keep fighting during a mission to retake the New Jedi Temple from the Lost Tribe of Sith, she experienced this state
